name: ListVendorCredits
description:
Retrieve and filter vendor credits from Zoho Books.

Retrieve a paginated list of vendor credits using various filtering, sorting, and search capabilities, such as by date, status, amount, vendor details, items, taxes, and custom fields.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization in Zoho Books.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: vendor_credit_number_filter
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by specific vendor credit number. Supports partial matching with options like 'startswith' and 'contains'.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by specific vendor credit number. Supports variants vendor_credit_number_startswith and vendor_credit_number_contains for partial matching.

parameters.name: filter_by_creation_date
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by creation date using yyyy-mm-dd format. Supports date_start, date_end, date_before, and date_after for range filtering.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by creation date. Use yyyy-mm-dd format. Supports variants: date_start, date_end, date_before and date_after for range-based filtering.

parameters.name: vendor_credit_status
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by their current status. Allowed values: 'open', 'closed', 'void', or 'draft'.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by their current status. Allowed values: open, closed, void, or draft.

parameters.name: total_amount_filter
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by total amount. Use variants: total_start, total_end, total_less_than, total_less_equals, total_greater_than, total_greater_equals.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by their total amount. Supports variants: total_start, total_end, total_less_than, total_less_equals, total_greater_than and total_greater_equals for comparison-based filtering.

parameters.name: reference_number_filter
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by their reference number, supporting 'startswith' and 'contains' for partial matches.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by their reference number. Supports variants: reference_number_startswith and reference_number_contains for partial matching.

parameters.name: filter_by_vendor_name
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by vendor name, supporting partial matches with 'startswith' and 'contains'.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by vendor name. Supports variants: customer_name_startswith and customer_name_contains for partial matching.

parameters.name: filter_by_item_name
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by item name. Use 'startswith:' or 'contains:' as prefixes for partial matching.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by item name. Supports variants: item_name_startswith and item_name_contains for partial matching.

parameters.name: item_description_filter
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by item description. Supports partial matching with 'startswith' and 'contains'.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by item description. Supports variants: item_description_startswith and item_description_contains for partial matching.

parameters.name: filter_by_notes_content
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by notes content. Use partial matching with variants: notes_startswith or notes_contains.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by notes content. Supports variants: notes_startswith and notes_contains for partial matching.

parameters.name: filter_by_custom_field
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by custom field values. Use 'custom_field_startswith' or 'custom_field_contains' for partial matching.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by custom field values. Supports variants: custom_field_startswith and custom_field_contains for partial matching.

parameters.name: filter_by_last_modified_time
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by last modified time using ISO 8601 format (yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss-hh:mm).

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by last modified time. Use ISO 8601 format (yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss-hh:mm) to search for vendor credits modified at specific times.

parameters.name: filter_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by a specific customer ID to find credits associated with that customer. Retrieve customer IDs from the contacts API.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by customer ID. Use this parameter to search for vendor credits associated with a specific customer. Retrieve customer IDs from the contacts API.

parameters.name: filter_by_line_item_id
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by a specific line item ID to find credits containing the item.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by line item ID. Use this parameter to search for vendor credits containing a specific line item within the vendor credit.

parameters.name: filter_by_item_id
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by a specific item ID. Use this to find vendor credits containing the item. Retrieve item IDs from the items API.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by item ID. Use this parameter to search for vendor credits containing a specific item. Retrieve item IDs from the items API.

parameters.name: filter_by_tax_id
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by specific tax ID to find credits with that tax applied. Tax IDs are retrieved from the taxes API.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by tax ID. Use this parameter to search for vendor credits with a specific tax applied. Retrieve tax IDs from the taxes API.

parameters.name: filter_by_status
parameters.description: Filter vendor credits by status using predefined values: Status.All, Status.Open, Status.Draft, Status.Closed, Status.Void.

value_schema.description: Filter vendor credits by status using predefined status values. Allowed values: Status.All, Status.Open, Status.Draft, Status.Closed, and Status.Void.

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Enter text to search vendor credits by credit number, vendor name, and reference number.

value_schema.description: Search vendor credits using text search across multiple fields. Searches vendor credit number, vendor name, and reference number.

parameters.name: sort_by_column
parameters.description: Specify which column to sort vendor credits by. Options: vendor_name, vendor_credit_number, balance, total, date, created_time, last_modified_time, reference_number.

value_schema.description: Sort vendor credits by specified column. Allowed values: vendor_name, vendor_credit_number, balance, total, date, created_time, last_modified_time, and reference_number.

parameters.name: pagination_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number to retrieve results from for pagination. Default is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number for pagination. Specify which page of results to retrieve. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: pagination_records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of vendor credit records to return per page. The default value is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records per page for pagination. Controls how many vendor credits are returned in each page. Default value is 200.
